text: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥٓ أَسۡلِمۡۖ قَالَ أَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

translation.en: When his Lord said to him, "Submit", he said "I have submitted [in Islam] to the Lord of the worlds
translation.id: (Ingatlah) ketika Tuhan berfirman kepadanya (Ibrahim), "Berserah dirilah!" Dia menjawab, "Aku berserah diri kepada Tuhan seluruh alam
